title: Ugly Planet
text: Ugly Planet is a <a href="music">music</a> <a href="culture">culture</a> <a href="magazine">magazine</a> dedicated to documenting <a href="artist">artist</a>s who support <a href="innovation">innovation</a>, diversity, equality, <a href="justice">justice</a>, and <a href="social">social</a> <a href="introspection">introspection</a>. The magazine seeks artists (regardless of <a href="genre">genre</a>) who endeavor to enlighten or engender political or social change.
